restriction: The size of each page should be of the format of one A4(8.27 Ã— 11.69 in). There should be 2 pages exactly allowed. The content should be prioritized in the cheatsheet should be examples, explanations. The following features of the crib sheet should make the sheet more comfortable to use, and should be prioritized: Compact, dense information in small text. The overall layout style should be Structured boxes or tables. The font size used in the cheatsheet should be in the Medium (11-12 pt) range to ensure readability and efficiency.
